### IPdfPageConfig.PreferCSSPageSize method
</br>


#### Sets preferred CSS media type for page size.

```csharp
public IPdfPageConfig PreferCSSPageSize(bool value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | referred CSS media type for page size. Default is `false`. |

### Return Value

[`IPdfPageConfig`](../IPdfPageConfig.md) instance.
